item.title: 软件仍是美国 IPO 反弹的缺失要素
item.description: 五月份一连串科技公司的成功亮相再次点燃了人们的乐观情绪，曾经盛极一时的企业软件行业不久将重新成为美国交易组合中的重要贡献者。【原文：May’s string of successful technology company debuts is reigniting optimism that the once-prolific enterprise software sector will soon resurface as a significant contributor to the US deal mix.】

item.title: 激进分子布朗宁-韦斯特与新任首席执行官布罗姆伯格带领 CAE 重新出发
item.description: 投资公司 Browning West LP 称，在新任首席执行官的领导下，飞行模拟器公司 CAE Inc.【原文：Investment firm Browning West LP says flight simulator company CAE Inc. should be able to double its profit over the next three to four years under the direction of a new chief executive officer.】

item.title: Clearlake 债务重组，为 Quest 软件获得新资金
item.description: Clearlake 资本集团支持的 Quest 软件公司将获得 3.5 亿美元的新资金，用于资助其人工智能和发展计划。【原文：A deal to provide Clearlake Capital Group-backed Quest Software Inc. with $350 million of fresh capital to help fund its artificial intelligence and growth plans is coming at the expense of some lenders who will be pushed down the repayment line.】

item.title: 加纳宣布再次通缉前财政部长奥福里-阿塔
item.description: 加纳特别检察官宣布再次通缉前财政部长肯-奥福里-阿塔（Ken Ofori-Atta），因为他错过了周一就其任期内项目付款问题接受质询的最后期限。【原文：Ghana’s special prosecutor has declared former Minister of Finance Ken Ofori-Atta wanted again after he missed a deadline Monday to appear for questioning about payments for projects during his tenure.】

item.title: Grindr 突然复职是 "破坏工会"，美国劳资关系委员会律师告诉法官
item.description: 美国劳工部检察官告诉该机构的一名法官，Grindr 公司 "突然 "改变了远程办公政策，要求员工返回办公室，以报复工会运动。【原文：Grindr Inc. changed its remote-work policy “out of the blue,” demanding employees return to the office in retaliation for a union drive after previously telling them they could keep teleworking, US labor board prosecutors told an agency judge.】

item.title: 加拿大总理就新管道、港口和矿山向卡尼抛出橄榄枝
item.description: 在周一举行的一次会议上，加拿大各省领导人敦促总理马克-卡尼支持新的石油管道、电网、重要矿产、港口和铁路项目，以确定应快速推进的 "国家建设 "项目。【原文：Canada’s provincial leaders urged Prime Minister Mark Carney to back new oil pipelines, electricity grids, critical mineral mines, ports and railways at a meeting on Monday meant to identify “nation-building” projects to be fast-tracked.】

item.title: 高级副总裁与贷款人就延长 Kloeckner 高级债务进行深入谈判
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Strategic Value Partners 公司和 Kloeckner Pentaplast 公司的一批债权人正在就延长这家德国包装公司优先债务到期日至明年以后的问题进行深入谈判，因为通货膨胀和需求减弱给该公司的业务带来了压力。【原文：Strategic Value Partners and a group of creditors of Kloeckner Pentaplast are in advanced talks to extend the maturity of the German packaging company’s senior debt beyond next year as inflation and waning demand pressure its business, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 塔斯社称，俄罗斯向乌克兰提出的建议寻求天然气过境回归
item.description: 据国营塔斯社援引俄罗斯提交给乌克兰的一份备忘录报道，该备忘录设想逐步恢复外交和经济关系，包括天然气过境。【原文：A Russian memorandum presented to Ukraine envisions the gradual restoration of diplomatic and economic ties, including with regard to natural-gas transit, the state-run Tass news service reported, citing the document.】

item.title: 最高法院征求司法部对赫兹债券持有人案件的意见
item.description: 最高法院邀请司法部就赫兹全球控股公司（Hertz Global Holdings Inc.【原文：The Supreme Court invited a brief from the Justice Department for advice on a Hertz Global Holdings Inc. case about a roughly $320 million payment that the rental car firm may owe to bondholders.】

item.title: 英国央行曼恩称官员需考虑债券销售的影响
item.description: 英格兰银行利率制定者凯瑟琳-曼（Catherine Mann）表示，官员们在决定利率政策时需要考虑量化紧缩政策可能对长期债券收益率和经济产生的影响。【原文：Bank of England rate-setter Catherine Mann said that officials need to consider the impact quantitative tightening may be having on long-dated bond yields and the economy when deciding interest-rate policy.】

item.title: 马斯克的 xAI 通过摩根士丹利启动 50 亿美元债务出售计划
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，摩根士丹利正在为埃隆-马斯克的人工智能公司 xAI Corp.【原文：Morgan Stanley is shopping a $5 billion debt package for Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence company, xAI Corp., according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 米莱的外汇交易策略引发 2019 年以来最强劲的美元需求
item.description: 在哈维尔-米莱伊总统几乎取消了这个危机频发的南美国家的外汇限制之后，阿根廷的美元需求创下了 2019 年以来的新高。【原文：Demand for dollars in Argentina hit its highest since 2019 after President Javier Milei all but eliminated foreign-exchange restrictions in the crisis-prone South American nation.】

item.title: 美联储主席古尔斯比表示，如果贸易政策得到解决，利率可能下降
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）重申，美国经济表面看来良好，如果贸易政策的不确定性得到解决，央行可以继续降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee reiterated the US economy looks good underneath the surface, and the central bank can proceed with interest-rate cuts if uncertainty around trade policy is resolved.】

item.title: 刚果铜矿洪水最新消息公布后艾芬豪股价大涨
item.description: 艾芬豪矿业有限公司（Ivanhoe Mines Ltd.）股价大涨，此前这家加拿大公司表示正在推进重新开放刚果民主共和国境内一座巨型铜矿部分矿区的工作，但尚未承诺重启日期。【原文：Ivanhoe Mines Ltd. shares jumped after the Canadian company said it’s advancing work on reopening parts of a giant copper mine in the Democratic Republic of Congo, without yet committing to a restart date.】

item.title: 美国 20 年期债券收益率创 2021 年以来最大跌幅
item.description: 周一上午，20 年期债券不再是美国国债曲线上收益率最高的债券，这只是一瞬间的事。【原文：For a fleeting moment Monday morning, 20-year bonds were no longer offering the highest yields on the US Treasuries curve.】

item.title: 特朗普计划利用拜登的绿色银行提供数十亿美元贷款
item.description: 根据政府 2026 财年预算申请的详细内容，特朗普政府计划利用总统曾试图扼杀的 4000 亿美元绿色银行，为核反应堆、地热发电和关键矿产提供数十亿美元的贷款。【原文：The Trump administration plans to use a $400 billion green bank the president once sought to kill to finance billions of dollars in loans for nuclear reactors, geothermal power and critical minerals, according to details of the administration’s fiscal year 2026 budget request.】

item.title: 保险公司规避私人信贷，摩根大通寻求 Trucordia 交易
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）正在为 Trucordia 近 20 亿美元的贷款寻找投资者，这是华尔街银行为保险公司最初从私人信贷公司获得的债务进行再融资的最新案例。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. is sounding out investors for an almost $2 billion loan for Trucordia, the latest instance of a Wall Street bank refinancing debt that insurers initially secured from private credit firms.】

item.title: 特朗普在贸易谈判中青睐飞机制造商，美国银行上调波音公司评级至买入
item.description: 特朗普政府已将波音公司的飞机订单纳入贸易谈判，这有助于恢复美国银行（Bank of America Corp.【原文：The Trump administration has been including orders for Boeing Co. planes in trade discussions, and that’s helping to restore Bank of America Corp.’s confidence in the stock.】

item.title: 美国经济出现漏洞
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 阿尔伯塔省野火导致加拿大约 7% 的石油生产停产
item.description: 加拿大能源中心地带阿尔伯塔省的野火导致该省近 35 万桶重质原油日产量停产，约占全国产量的 7%。【原文：Wildfires in Canada’s energy heartland of Alberta have shut down almost 350,000 barrels of daily heavy crude production — about 7% of the country’s output — as a major blaze near the province’s eastern border menaces oil sands operations.】

item.title: 特朗普撤消对美国国家航空航天局首席执行官的提名，Shift4 领导层岌岌可危
item.description: 泰勒-劳伯（Taylor Lauber）准备在不久后开始他的新工作，担任 Shift4 支付公司的首席执行官，因为该公司的创始人和现任首席执行官准备前往华盛顿，在唐纳德-特朗普总统的领导下领导美国国家航空航天局（NASA）。【原文：Taylor Lauber was preparing to start his new job as chief executive officer of Shift4 Payments Inc. soon, as the company’s founder and current CEO got ready to head to Washington to lead NASA under President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 贸易紧张局势加剧，特朗普团队推动与习近平通话
item.description: 据特朗普政府的一位官员称，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和中国国家主席习近平很可能在本周举行会谈，因为世界上最大的两个经济体仍处于贸易动荡之中。【原文：US President Donald Trump and Chinese President Xi Jinping are likely to speak this week, according to a Trump administration official, as the world’s two largest economies remain locked in trade turmoil.】

item.title: 洛根称美联储可以等待，因为通胀和就业的风险是平衡的
item.description: 达拉斯联邦储备银行行长洛里-洛根（Lorie Logan）表示，美国央行在评估通胀和失业风险时可以保持耐心。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Dallas President Lorie Logan said the US central bank can remain patient as it assesses risks to both inflation and unemployment.】

item.title: 德国银行支付数百万美元解决破产的 Signa 公司的索赔问题
item.description: 最近几周，Helaba 和其他德国贷款机构支付了数百万欧元，以解决前房地产大亨 Rene Benko 的 Signa Prime Selection AG 管理人提出的索赔。【原文：Helaba and other German lenders have paid millions of euros in recent weeks to settle claims by the administrator of former real estate tycoon Rene Benko’s Signa Prime Selection AG.】

item.title: 马里法院将对巴里克金矿的裁决推迟至 6 月 5 日
item.description: 马里法院第三次推迟了对巴里克黄金公司（Barrick Gold Corp.【原文：A Malian court has for the third time postponed a ruling on whether Barrick Gold Corp.’s Loulo-Gounkoto mine should be placed under state administration.】

item.title: 比特币投机热潮消退，赛勒的比特币 "山寨版 "落伍了
item.description: 事实证明，购买比特币来提高股价可能并不像以前看起来那样是企业的灵丹妙药。【原文：Turns out, buying Bitcoin to boost your share price might not be the corporate panacea that it once seemed.】

item.title: 量化对冲基金 CFM 在多伦多设立办事处，进军加拿大市场
item.description: 法国量化对冲基金 Capital Fund Management SA 在多伦多开设了办事处，以吸引加拿大的富裕投资者。【原文：French quantitative hedge fund Capital Fund Management SA opened an office in Toronto to attract wealthy investors in Canada.】

item.title: 中国对稀土的掌控为习近平在美国贸易对决中提供了筹码
item.description: 中美两国在日内瓦就降低天价关税达成一致后，目前在芯片和稀土的使用权问题上的紧张局势急剧升温。北京似乎越来越有优势。【原文：After the US and China agreed in Geneva to lower tariffs from astronomical heights, tensions are now surging over access to chips and rare earths. And Beijing increasingly appears to have an edge.】

item.title: 马特黑向智利投票承诺人提出财政困境的现实问题
item.description: 面对左翼和右翼两条战线上的竞选活动，智利总统候选人伊夫林-马特希（Evelyn Matthei）试图通过承认经济疲软这一冷酷无情的事实，而不是通过全面的承诺来标新立异。【原文：Faced with an electoral campaign fought on two fronts — against the left and the hard right — Chile’s presidential front-runner Evelyn Matthei is trying to mark a difference not through sweeping promises, but by recognizing the cold, hard facts of a weak economy.】

item.title: 美国 5 月制造业活动连续第三个月萎缩
item.description: 美国 5 月份的工厂活动连续第三个月萎缩，一项进口指标跌至 16 年来的最低点，原因是面对更高的关税，企业采取了缩减措施。【原文：US factory activity contracted in May for a third consecutive month and a gauge of imports fell to a 16-year low as firms pulled back in the face of higher tariffs.】
